data.title: Pony.ai gains citywide clearance to operate Robotaxis in Shenzhen
data.description:
Pony. ai, an autonomous driving company based in China, has made headlines after receiving the first citywide license to operate driverless commercial robotaxis in the southern Chinese city of Shenzhen. This paves the way for scalable driverless commercial operations across one of China’s most innovative cities. The company announced that the permit was awarded jointly to […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/pony-ai-gains-shenzhen-clearance-robotaxis/

data.title: 70M daily transactions, $143B volume: How Solana won DeFi’s throughput race
data.description:
Solana (SOL) processes approximately 70 million transactions per day and recorded over $143 billion in monthly DEX volume as of Oct. 30, according to DefiLlama. The network operates with 1,295 consensus validators across 40 countries, and a Nakamoto Coefficient of 20, according to the Foundation’s June 2025 Network Health Report
source: https://cryptoslate.com/70m-daily-transactions-143b-volume-how-solana-won-defis-throughput-race/

data.title: Gold holds steady at $4,021.86 /oz, on track for a 4% monthly gain
data.description:
Gold is holding near $4,021. 86 per ounce, staying close to the $4,000 mark as traders look at the new U. S. –China one-year trade truce and try to figure out what it actually means. The price has moved back and forth this week, but it has not broken down in a major way. Spot prices fell as […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/gold-holds-steady-at-4021-86-oz/

data.title: The halving paradox: Why miners earn more despite getting 93.75% less Bitcoin
data.description:
While Bitcoin miners receive a fraction of the cryptocurrency they once did, their rewards in dollar terms have reached all-time highs.
source: https://ambcrypto.com/the-halving-paradox-why-miners-earn-more-despite-getting-93-75-less-bitcoin/

The […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/official-ufc-web3-partner-fight-token-sees-183m-demand-in-presale/

data.title: Oil giants Exxon and Chevron beat Q3 earnings with profits of $8.1 billion and $3.6 billion
data.description:
Oil giants Exxon Mobil and Chevron reported third-quarter earnings on Friday that came in stronger than expected, according to data provided by LSEG, despite falling oil prices and a 16% drop in U. S. crude this year. Both companies pushed out record-high production numbers, with Exxon pulling in $8. 1 billion in profit while Chevron posted $3. 6 […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/oil-giants-exxon-chevron-beat-q3-earnings/

data.title: The "whale with a 100% win rate since October 11th" has accumulated over $16.75 million in unrealized losses on its long positions in BTC, ETH, and SOL.
data.description: Hyperbot data shows that the "100% win rate whale since 10.11" has suffered a total unrealized loss of over $16.75 million on its long positions in BTC, ETH, and SOL, including: $4.31 million on ETH long positions; $3.27 million on BTC long positions; and $9.16 million on SOL long positions.

data.title: Hong Kong Advances Digital Money Strategy as HKMA’s e-HKD Pilot Programme Enters Phase Two
data.description:
The Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA), with analytical support from Deloitte, has released its e-HKD Pilot Programme Phase 2 Report, offering a look into how central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) and other digital money forms could reshape the city’s financial ecosystem.
source: https://cryptonews.com/news/hong-kong-advances-digital-money-strategy-as-hkmas-e-hkd-pilot-programme-enters-phase-two/
